entry.data:
CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY AND NOT AS COOL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
